title: Start Here Learn HTML 5
description:
Start Here! Learn HTML5


Microsoft Press (November 2012) | ISBN: 0735669821 | PDF + EPUB | 360 pages | 43.0 MB
 
Ready to learn HTML5 programming? Start Here!
 
Learn the fundamentals of programming with HTML5Ã¢â‚¬â€and begin building your first standards-based web pages from the ground up. If you have absolutely no previous experience, no problemÃ¢â‚¬â€simply start here! This book introduces must-know concepts and getting-started techniques through easy-to-follow explanations, examples, and exercises.
 
 
HereÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s where you start learning HTML5
 
Create a web site using HTML5 tags in a simple text editor
Use semantic tags to make your pages easier to layout and find
Draw in HTML5 using the canvas element
Embed audio and video in your web pages
Get HTML5 to work in older browsers
Develop your future skills in web design
